description: Erection of single storey rear extension (4.50m in depth, maximum height of 3.86m and eaves height of 2.65m)
decision_conditions: The proposed single storey rear extension falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule  2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Erection of hip to gable roof extension, rear dormer extension and installation of three rooflights to facilitate loft conversion.

The Council's Neighbourhood Traffic Engineer and Environmental Health Officer are satisfied with the information provided in relation to Condition 11 (Construction Management Plan).As such, the details submitted by the applicant are considered satisfactory and Condition 11 of planing permission 19/01813/FUL is hereby fully approved.

Please provide proposed roof plan of the garden shed at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing the outline of entire property not just part and showing dimensions of proposed work.

Please be advised if you wish to submit a Lawful Developement Certificate application, we will require an email to request the withdrawal of this application. The fee will then be transferred to your new application and the balance refunded.Your new application will require all the documents previously requested
